AnswerToAttendeeQuestion.description: Describes an answer to a question asked by an attendee during a webinar session.

answer.description: An answer given to a question asked by an attendee during a webinar session

answeredBy.description: The key of the organizer that answered the attendee's question

Attendance.description: Describes the times the attendee joined and left a webinar session.

joinTime.description: The time the attendee joined a webinar session

leaveTime.description: The time the attendee left a webinar session

AttendanceStatistics.description: Describes attendance metrics for a webinar session.

averageAttentiveness.description: Average based on the focus of the attendees Viewer during the webinar session

averageInterestRating.description: Numerical value 1-100 (100 being most interested) indicating the average interest rating of the webinar attendees

percentageAttendance.description: The percentage of registrants that actually attended the webinar session

registrantCount.description: The number of registrations for the webinar

Attendee.description: Describes the attendee of a webinar

attendance.description: The list of times the attendee joined and left the webinar session

attendanceTimeInSeconds.description: The total attendance time in seconds

registrantKey.description: The key of the webinar attendee

sessionKey.description: The unique key of the webinar session

AttendeeQuestion.description: Describes the question asked by an attendee during a webinar session; includes the answers given to it.

answers.description: Answer to a question of an attendee and key of the organizer that answered

askedBy.description: The email address of the attendee that asked the question

question.description: The question asked by the attendee

webinarKey.description: The unique key of the webinar.

CustomAnswers.description: Answers to custom questions of the registrant

answer.description: Answer to a custom question when registering

DateTimeRange.description: A pair of DateTime values, the first of which serves as a start time and the second as an end time of an interval.

endTime.description: The ending time of an interval, e.g. 2015-07-13T22:00:00Z

startTime.description: The starting time of an interval, e.g. 2015-07-13T10:00:00Z

description.description: A short description of the webinar

organizerKey.description: The key of the webinar organizer

times.description: Array with startTime and endTime for the webinar sessions

timeZone.description: The timezone where the webinar is taking place

webinarKey.description: The unique key of the webinar

Poll.description: A poll or survey launched by an organizer during or after a webinar session; includes the responses given to it by the attendees.

numberOfResponses.description: The total number of responses received for this poll or survey

question.description: The poll or survey question asked by the webinar organizer

responses.description: The responses given by the attendees to the poll or survey

PollAnswer.description: Describes the answer given by a webinar attendee to a poll or survey launched by an organizer.

answer.description: The answer given to the poll or survey question

PollResponse.description: One of the potential responses/options to a poll or survey launched by an organizer during a webinar session.

percentage.description: The percentage of responses that favored this particular option

text.description: The text of the response/option to a poll or survey

PollsAndSurveysStatistics.description: Details on the polls and surveys for a webinar session.

percentagePollsCompleted.description: The percentage of polls completed by the attendees

percentageSurveysCompleted.description: The percentage of surveys completed by the attendees

pollCount.description: The number of polls launched at a webinar session

questionsAsked.description: The number of questions asked at a webinar session

surveyCount.description: The percentage of surveys launched at a webinar session

joinUrl.description: The URL the registrant will use to join the webinar

timeZone.description: The time zone where the webinar will take place

RegistrantCreated.description: Describes a newly created webinar registrant.

joinUrl.description: The URL the registrant will use to join the webinar.

RegistrantDetailed.description: Detailed description of a webinar registrant with all registration fields.

employeeCount.description: The size in employees of the registrant's organization

implementationTimeFrame.description: The time frame within which the product will be purchased

industry.description: The type of industry the registrant's organization belongs to

joinUrl.description: URL the registrant can join the webinar

numberOfEmployees.description: The size in employees of the registrant's organization

purchasingRole.description: The registrant's role in purchasing the product

purchasingTimeFrame.description: The time frame within which the product will be purchased

questionsAndComments.description: Any questions or comments the registrant made at the time of registration

timeZone.description: The time zone where the webinar will take place

type.description: The type is REGULAR for "One session" and "Sequence" webinars. For webinar series this parameter is not passed

unsubscribed.description: Indicates whether the registrant opted-out from receiving other emails from this webinar's organizer

RegistrantFields.description: Detailed description of a all fields to register a registrant for a webinar.

industry.description: The type of industry the registrant's organization belongs to

numberOfEmployees.description: The size in employees of the registrant's organization

purchasingRole.description: The registrant's role in purchasing the product

purchasingTimeFrame.description: The time frame within which the product will be purchased

questionsAndComments.description: Any questions or comments the registrant made at the time of registration

responses.description: Set the answers of all questions

RegistrantQAResponse.description:
Describes a completed registration question for a webinar registrant. If you use "Multiple choice" questions the response contains the numeric answerKey, otherwise the answer text. Example:
{
"firstName": "First",
"lastName": "Last",
"email": "First.Last@example.com",
"responses": [{
"questionKey": 17023549,
"responseText": "This is a short answer"},{
"questionKey": 17023550,
"answerKey": 17023553} ]
}

answerKey.description: The numeric key of the answer to a multiple-choice question.

questionKey.description: The unique key of the question

RegistrationAnswer.description: Describes an answer to a multiple choice custom registration field.

RegistrationField.description: Describes a field for a webinar registration.

answers.description: List of choices for a multiple choice registration field

field.description: The name of the registration field

maxSize.description: The character size of the custom registration field (max 128)

required.description: Indicates whether the custom registration field is compulsory

RegistrationFields.description: The fields to be completed on the webinar registration form.

fields.description: The default fields the organizer has selected for the webinar registration form

questions.description: Custom fields created by the organizer for the webinar registration form

RegistrationQuestion.description: Describes a custom field for a webinar registration.

answers.description: The answers to a multiple choice custom registration field

maxSize.description: The character size of the custom registration field (max 1000)

question.description: The value (text) of the custom registration field

questionKey.description: The unique key of the custom registration field

required.description: Indicates whether the custom registration field is compulsory

type.description: Indicates whether the custom registration field requires a single short answer or whether it is a multiple choice question

WebinarReqCreate.description: Describes the details used to create a new single session webinar.

description.description: A short description of the webinar (2048 characters maximum)

subject.description: The name/subject of the webinar (128 characters maximum)

times.description: Array with startTime and endTime for webinar. Since this call creates single session webinars, the array can only contain a single pair of startTime and endTime

timeZone.description: The time zone where the webinar is taking place (must be a valid time zone ID, see https://developer.citrixonline.com/citrix-rest-api-date-formats-and-time-zones). If this parameter is not passed the timezone of the organizer's profile will be used

info.description: The Citrix GoToWebinar API provides seamless integration of webinar registrant and attendee data into your existing infrastructure or third-party applications. The ability to register participants, as well as pull lists of registrants and attendees for a webinar, allows organizers to manage the flow of information between their primary applications without manual intervention.
info.title: GoToWebinar REST API

get.description: Returns details for completed webinars for the specified organizer and completed webinars of other organizers where the specified organizer is a co-organizer.

parameters.description: A required start of datetime range in ISO8601 UTC format, e.g. 2015-07-13T10:00:00Z
parameters.name: fromTime

parameters.description: A required end of datetime range in ISO8601 UTC format, e.g. 2015-07-13T22:00:00Z
parameters.name: toTime

get.description: Retrieve all completed sessions of all the webinars of a given organizer.

parameters.description: A required start of datetime range in ISO8601 UTC format, e.g. 2015-07-13T10:00:00Z
parameters.name: fromTime

parameters.description: A required end of datetime range in ISO8601 UTC format, e.g. 2015-07-13T22:00:00Z
parameters.name: toTime

get.description: Returns webinars scheduled for the future for the specified organizer and webinars of other organizers where the specified organizer is a co-organizer.
Returns webinars scheduled for the future for a specified organizer.

post.description: Creates a single session webinar. The call requires an organizer, a webinar subject and description, and a start and end time. The response provides a numeric webinarKey in string format for the new webinar. Once a webinar has been created with this method, you can accept registrations.

get.description: Retrieve information on a specific webinar. If the type of the webinar is "sequence", a sequence of future times will be provided. Webinars of type "series" are treated the same as normal webinars - each session in the webinar series has a different webinarKey. If an organizer cancels a webinar, then a request to get that webinar would return a "404 Not Found" error.
Returns all attendees for all sessions of the specified webinar.
get.summary: Get attendees for all webinar sessions

get.description: Gets the coorganizers of a specific webinar.
Retrieves the meeting times for a webinar.
Retrieves all the panelists for a specific webinar.
Gets performance details for all sessions of a specific webinar.
get.summary: Get performance for all webinar sessions

get.description:
Retrieve registration details for all registrants of a specific webinar. Registrant details will not include all fields captured when creating the registrant. To see all data, use the API call "Get Registrant". Registrants can have one of the following states;
WAITING - registrant registered and is awaiting approval (where organizer has required approval),
APPROVED - registrant registered and is approved, and
DENIED - registrant registered and was denied.

post.description: Register an attendee for a scheduled webinar. The response contains the registrantKey and join URL for the registrant. An email will be sent to the registrant unless the organizer turns off the confirmation email setting from the GoToWebinar website. Please note that you must provide all required fields including custom fields defined during the webinar creation. Use thr API call "Get registration fields" to get a list of all fields, if they are required, and their possible values. At this time there are two versions of the "Create Registrant" call. The first version only accepts firstName, lastName, and email and ignores all other fields. If you have custom fields or want to capture additional information this version won't work for you. The second version allows you to pass all required and optional fields, including custom fields defined when creating the webinar. To use the second version you must pass the header value "Accept: application/vnd.citrix.g2wapi-v1.1+json" instead of "Accept: application/json". Leaving this header out results in the first version of the API call.

parameters.description: Set to "application/vnd.citrix.g2wapi-v1.1+json" to make a registration using fields (custom or default) additional to the basic ones.
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: Indicates whether the confirmation email should be resent when a registrant is re-registered. The default value is false.
parameters.name: resendConfirmation

parameters.description: The registrant details. To get all possible values run the API call "Get registration fields" which is also part of this documentation.
parameters.name: body

delete.description: Removes a webinar registrant from current registrations for the specified webinar. The webinar must be a scheduled, future webinar.

get.description: Retrieve registration details for a specific registrant.
Retrieve required, optional registration, and custom questions for a specified webinar.
Retrieves details for all past sessions of a specific webinar.

Retrieves attendance details for a specific webinar session that has ended. If attendees attended the session ("registrantsAttended"), specific attendance details, such as attendenceTime for a registrant, will also be retrieved.

parameters.description: The key of the webinar session
parameters.name: sessionKey
